Class SqlConnection

java.lang.Object
com.icx.jdbc.SqlConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable
public class SqlConnection extends Object implements AutoCloseable
Thin autoclosable database connection layer based on ConnectionPool.
